stories.text:
Hi all,

Looking for courses with depth in technical fields (graphics, OS, embedded, robotics, programming, web etc) that result in a meaningful and tangible project. These courses can be paid or free but really looking for quality and depth.

I view these as a form of entertainment and excited to learn about whats out there.

As for an example: https://threejs-journey.xyz/

I believe a good format for submission would be:

Course: Topic: Project: Time: Link:

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Recommendations for Project Based Courses

stories.text:
I joined one of the FAANG companies 2 years ago. I noticed that amoongsr my team I’m dairy a high performer (quoted directly by my manger and peers). I also know there is at least one person who causes more confusion than clarity (our cross functional partner manager have said this). I feel like I was under-leveled when I joined the company.

I know I can interview elsewhere and get paid more.

But I really love the work, roadmaps/vision, this team, business unit, and really do believe in the company’s future.

What’s the best way for me to help my manager get me the best possible compensation increase in upcoming review? I have asked for feedback and whether I’m on-track to be promoted. They’ve said yes and I’m reasonably confident I’m at the next level. What do I do to make sure I communicate my value as being at the upper end or median point of that level.
stories.title: Ask HN: What’s the best way to “negotiate” compensation increases at review?
